4441.quoteText: You are granting us with a non-exclusive, permanent, irrevocable, unlimited license to use, publish, or re-publish your Content in connection with the Service.
4441.title: The copyright license that users grant to the service is limited for the purposes of that same service, and not third parties.

tosdr.case: Copyright license limited for the purposes of that same service but transferable and sublicenseable
tosdr.tldr: Extract from the Terms of Service: 'You are granting us with a non-exclusive, permanent, irrevocable, unlimited license to use, publish, or re-publish your Content in connection with the Service.' Apart from the permance and irrevocability of the license all points are necessary as the website, among other things, acts as a distribution platform for the software of users.

4442.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time

tosdr.case: This service provides archives of their Terms of Service so that changes can be viewed over time
tosdr.tldr: Whole ToS and Rules history can be found via the source link.

tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time
tosdr.tldr: The ToS states 'If you wish to close your account, please contact us.' without any temporal limitation.

4577.quoteText:
Standard cookies we set

These are the main cookies we set during normal operation of the software.

  • xf_session
    • Stores the current ID of your session.
  • xf_user
    • Stores a key, unique to you, which allows us to keep you logged in to the software as you navigate from page to page.

4727.quoteText: All Content you submit or upload may be sent to third-party verification services (including, but not limited to, spam prevention services). Do not submit any Content that you consider to be private or confidential.
4727.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr: Please note that SpigotMC does not usually disclose your content to third parties (as only limited third party tools for inspecting java code exist) and instead checks jars with open-source tools and staff members.

4729.quoteText:
Racism, sexism, or other forms of bigotry are strictly prohibited.
  1. Do not use racial slurs or bigoted remarks (e.g. concerning English abilities or choice of programming language) towards other users.
  • Any form of trolling, flaming, flame-baiting, or being overly aggressive towards other users it not permitted.
    1. Keep discussion civil. Do not harass or threaten other users, or use SpigotMC as a place to coordinate attacks on others.
